statements: SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE table_number = 10;
SELECT party_size, table_number FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-11-15';
SELECT * FROM reservations ORDER BY table_number DESC;
SELECT AVG(party_size) FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) FROM reservations GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT MAX(party_size) FROM reservations;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE party_size > 5 AND reservation_date < '2022-12-01';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT reservation_id, party_size FROM reservations WHERE party_size BETWEEN 4 AND 6;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT reservation_id, table_number FROM reservations WHERE table_number IN (5, 10, 15);
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, party_size FROM reservations WHERE customer_name <> 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE customer_name IN ('Alice', 'Charlie');
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-10-15' AND party_size = 3;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date, table_number, party_size FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name FROM reservations WHERE party_size > 4 ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(reservation_id) AS reservation_count FROM reservations GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(reservation_id) > 1;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(party_size) AS average_party_size FROM reservations GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, party_size FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, table_number FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_date, table_number;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date, party_size FROM reservations WHERE party_size > 6 AND reservation_date = '2022-02-15';
SELECT customer_name, table_number, party_size FROM reservations WHERE table_number IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date < '2022-03-01' OR table_number = 5;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, party_size FROM reservations WHERE party_size < 5 AND reservation_date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_name, table_number, party_size FROM reservations WHERE party_size BETWEEN 4 AND 8;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS reservation_count FROM reservations GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, party_size FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-04-15' AND table_number = 10;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_name) AS unique_customers_count FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, table_number FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND reservation_date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_name, MAX(party_size) AS max_party_size FROM reservations GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM reservations WHERE party_size < 4;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, table_number FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-03-01' OR party_size = 2;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name, reservation_date FROM reservations;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, party_size FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_time, party_size FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements;
SELECT table_name, capacity, location FROM seating_arrangements;
SELECT table_id, location FROM seating_arrangements WHERE capacity >= 4;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE party_size > 6;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01' AND guest_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements WHERE is_reserved = FALSE;
SELECT table_name, capacity FROM seating_arrangements WHERE location = 'Patio';
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements WHERE capacity = 2 AND is_reserved = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM seating_arrangements;
SELECT guest_name, party_size FROM reservations WHERE guest_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT reservation_id, guest_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE party_size <= 4;
SELECT table_name, capacity, location FROM seating_arrangements ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT table_id, table_name, location FROM seating_arrangements WHERE capacity BETWEEN 6 AND 8;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE party_size > 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE guest_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-03-15' AND party_size >= 6;
SELECT guest_name, party_size FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements WHERE capacity >= 8 AND location = 'Main Dining Room';
SELECT table_name, capacity FROM seating_arrangements WHERE is_reserved = FALSE;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity;
SELECT guest_name, location FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity WHERE s.is_reserved = FALSE;
SELECT r.guest_name AS guest, s.table_name AS table FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, location FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity WHERE s.location = 'Outdoor Patio';
SELECT guest_name, table_name, reservation_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity WHERE s.is_reserved = TRUE;
SELECT r.* FROM reservations r LEFT JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity WHERE s.capacity IS NULL;
SELECT table_name, location, COUNT(*) AS number_of_reservations FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity GROUP BY table_name, location;
SELECT guest_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY guest_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT guest_name FROM reservations;
SELECT table_name, location, SUM(r.party_size) AS total_capacity FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.party_size <= s.capacity GROUP BY table_name, location;
SELECT guest_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations UNION SELECT table_name, location, capacity AS party_size FROM seating_arrangements;
SELECT * FROM Reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date FROM Reservations WHERE table_number = 5;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_time FROM Reservations WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Tables;
SELECT table_number, capacity FROM Tables WHERE status = 'Available';
SELECT table_number, status FROM Tables WHERE capacity >= 6;
SELECT * FROM SeatingArrangements;
SELECT arrangement_id, table_number, arrangement_name FROM SeatingArrangements WHERE description LIKE '%family%';
SELECT arrangement_id, table_number, description FROM SeatingArrangements WHERE arrangement_name = 'VIP';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM Reservations ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;
SELECT table_number, capacity, status FROM Tables ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT table_number, capacity, status FROM Tables ORDER BY status ASC, capacity DESC;
SELECT arrangement_id, table_number, arrangement_name, description FROM SeatingArrangements ORDER BY table_number ASC;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-09-15';
SELECT table_number, capacity, status FROM Tables WHERE status = 'Occupied' OR capacity < 4;
SELECT table_number, capacity, status FROM Tables WHERE status IN ('Reserved', 'Occupied');
SELECT arrangement_id, description FROM SeatingArrangements WHERE description IS NULL;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM Reservations LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Reservations WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM Reservations r JOIN Tables t ON r.table_number = t.table_number WHERE t.capacity >= 4;
SELECT customer_name, table_number, reservation_time FROM Reservations r JOIN Tables t ON r.table_number = t.table_number WHERE t.status = 'Available';
SELECT * FROM Reservations r JOIN SeatingArrangements s ON r.table_number = s.table_number;
SELECT r.reservation_id, r.customer_name, t.capacity FROM Reservations r JOIN Tables t ON r.table_number = t.table_number;
SELECT r.customer_name, s.arrangement_name FROM Reservations r JOIN SeatingArrangements s ON r.table_number = s.table_number WHERE s.arrangement_name = 'VIP';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_reservations FROM Reservations;
SELECT t.table_number, COUNT(r.reservation_id) as total_reservations FROM Tables t LEFT JOIN Reservations r ON t.table_number = r.table_number GROUP BY t.table_number;
SELECT a.arrangement_name, COUNT(r.reservation_id) as total_reservations FROM SeatingArrangements a LEFT JOIN Reservations r ON a.table_number = r.table_number GROUP BY a.arrangement_name;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) as total_reservations FROM Reservations GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT reservation_date, COUNT(*) as total_reservations FROM Reservations GROUP BY reservation_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT MAX(reservation_date) as latest_reservation_date FROM Reservations;
SELECT MIN(reservation_date) as earliest_reservation_date FROM Reservations;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(t.capacity) as total_capacity FROM Reservations r JOIN Tables t ON r.table_number = t.table_number GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(t.capacity) as avg_capacity FROM Reservations r JOIN Tables t ON r.table_number = t.table_number GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-05-27' AND reservation_time >= '18:00:00';
SELECT r.reservation_id, r.customer_name, t.status FROM Reservations r JOIN Tables t ON r.table_number = t.table_number ORDER BY r.customer_name ASC, t.table_number DESC;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM tables;
SELECT table_name, capacity FROM tables;
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements;
SELECT table_id, reservation_id FROM seating_arrangements;
SELECT * FROM menu_items;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM menu_items;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time, party_size FROM reservations;
SELECT table_name, capacity, location FROM tables;
SELECT item_name, category FROM menu_items;
SELECT reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations;
SELECT table_name, capacity, location FROM tables;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time, party_size FROM reservations;
SELECT table_id, table_name, capacity, location FROM tables;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM menu_items;
SELECT reservation_date, reservation_time, party_size FROM reservations;
SELECT table_name, location FROM tables;
SELECT item_name, price FROM menu_items;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, party_size FROM reservations WHERE party_size > 4;
SELECT r.reservation_id, r.customer_name, t.table_name FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id JOIN tables t ON s.table_id = t.table_id;
SELECT m.item_name, m.category, m.price FROM menu_items m WHERE m.price < 10.00;

SELECT r.customer_name, t.table_name, r.reservation_date FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id JOIN tables t ON s.table_id = t.table_id WHERE r.reservation_date = '2022-02-14';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM reservations;
SELECT AVG(party_size) AS average_party_size FROM reservations;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM tables;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, reservation_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, party_size, COUNT(*) AS total_reservations FROM reservations GROUP BY customer_name, party_size HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, party_size DESC;
SELECT t.table_name, COUNT(s.arrangement_id) AS total_reservations FROM tables t LEFT JOIN seating_arrangements s ON t.table_id = s.table_id GROUP BY t.table_name ORDER BY total_reservations DESC;
SELECT AVG(m.price) AS average_price, MAX(m.price) AS max_price, MIN(m.price) AS min_price FROM menu_items m;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, TIME(reservation_time) AS reservation_hour FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-03-20';
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE reservation_time BETWEEN '12:00:00' AND '16:00:00';

SELECT r.customer_name, COUNT(s.arrangement_id) AS total_reservations FROM reservations r LEFT JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id GROUP BY r.customer_name HAVING COUNT(s.arrangement_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_reservations DESC;

SELECT t.table_name, COUNT(s.arrangement_id) AS total_reservations FROM tables t LEFT JOIN seating_arrangements s ON t.table_id = s.table_id GROUP BY t.table_name HAVING COUNT(s.arrangement_id) < 2 ORDER BY t.table_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, category, SUM(price) AS total_spent FROM reservations r JOIN menu_items m ON r.reservation_id = m.item_id GROUP BY customer_name, category ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT r.customer_name, COUNT(DISTINCT r.reservation_id) AS total_visits FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id GROUP BY r.customer_name HAVING total_visits > 1 ORDER BY total_visits DESC;

SELECT t.table_name, capacity, COUNT(s.arrangement_id) AS total_reservations FROM tables t LEFT JOIN seating_arrangements s ON t.table_id = s.table_id GROUP BY t.table_name, capacity ORDER BY total_reservations DESC, capacity DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM menu_items GROUP BY category ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_time FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM tables;
SELECT table_number, number_of_seats FROM tables;
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements;
SELECT table_id, reservation_id FROM seating_arrangements;
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM seating_arrangements;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM restaurant;
SELECT name, location FROM restaurant;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-10-31';
SELECT table_id, reservation_id, start_time, end_time FROM seating_arrangements WHERE start_time >= '18:00:00';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM tables ORDER BY number_of_seats DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-11-01' AND '2022-11-30';
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements WHERE end_time < '20:00:00';
SELECT name, location FROM restaurant WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations JOIN customers ON reservations.customer_name = customers.name;
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangements JOIN tables ON seating_arrangements.table_id = tables.table_id;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations;
SELECT * FROM tables WHERE number_of_seats >= 4;
SELECT table_number, number_of_seats FROM tables WHERE table_number BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT r.customer_name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id;
SELECT c.name, c.phone_number, r.reservation_date FROM customers c JOIN reservations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT r.customer_name, t.table_number, s.start_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id JOIN tables t ON s.table_id = t.table_id;
SELECT r.customer_name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id WHERE r.reservation_date = '2023-01-15';

SELECT r.customer_name, t.table_number, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id JOIN tables t ON s.table_id = t.table_id WHERE t.number_of_seats >= 4;
SELECT r.customer_name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id WHERE s.start_time >= '18:00';
SELECT r.customer_name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id WHERE s.end_time <= '21:00';
SELECT c.name, c.phone_number, r.reservation_date FROM customers c JOIN reservations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id WHERE r.reservation_date BETWEEN '2023-01-15' AND '2023-01-30';

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, r.reservation_date, t.table_number, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM customers c JOIN reservations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id JOIN tables t ON s.table_id = t.table_id;
SELECT r.customer_name, COUNT(s.seating_id) AS num_seats_reserved FROM reservations r LEFT JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id GROUP BY r.customer_name;
SELECT r.customer_name, COUNT(*) AS num_reservations FROM reservations r GROUP BY r.customer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT r.customer_name, t.table_number, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id JOIN tables t ON s.table_id = t.table_id ORDER BY r.customer_name ASC;

SELECT r.customer_name, t.table_number, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id JOIN tables t ON s.table_id = t.table_id ORDER BY s.start_time DESC;

SELECT r.customer_name, t.table_number, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id JOIN tables t ON s.table_id = t.table_id WHERE t.number_of_seats >= 4 ORDER BY r.customer_name ASC;

SELECT r.customer_name, t.table_number, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM reservations r JOIN seating_arrangements s ON r.reservation_id = s.reservation_id JOIN tables t ON s.table_id = t.table_id WHERE t.number_of_seats >= 4 ORDER BY s.start_time DESC;
